entry.tran: (委员会、组织机构的)主席;(公司)总裁
entry.def: The chairman of a committee, organization, or company is the head of it.

example.ex: Glyn Ford is chairman of the Committee which produced the report...
example.tran: 格林·福特是提交这份报告的委员会的主席。

example.ex: I had done business with the company's chairman.
example.tran: 我和那家公司的总裁有过生意往来。

entry.def: The chairman of a meeting or debate is the person in charge, who decides when each person is allowed to speak.

example.ex: The chairman declared the meeting open...
example.tran: 大会主席宣布会议开幕。

means.word_mean: 1. the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization;
1. act or preside as chair, as of an academic department in a university;

sentences.sentence: "She chaired the department for many years"
